arena/faction-cup-1.json/rounds/4/object.orig:
Crack the shells of \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/drillertoise]s\c[0] with the help of your trusty \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]!

arena/faction-cup-1.json/rounds/4/object.text:

arena/faction-cup-1.json/rounds/5/object.orig:

\c[3]Break the leader\c[0] to deactivate the \c[3]shields\c[0] of the turrets!

\c[3]Brisez le leader\c[0] pour désactiver les boucliers des tourelles !

arena/faction-cup-2.json/rounds/3/object.orig:
